sequence:
An Easily Flustered Girl's Story

<size=45>Chapter 1 - An Easily Flustered Girl's Day</size>

scripts.say: Port - Office
My secretary, Honolulu, was standing in front of a bookcase and sorting documents.
Hey, uh... Could you not stare at me so much? I can't work properly when you do that...
...... (The Commander silently stopped observing Honolulu.)
*Sigh*... So, will these documents be all you need?
...... (The Commander silently nodded in agreement.)
Are you gonna inspect my gear? Fine, as long as you don't do anything weird...
...... (The Commander silently got ready to inspect Honolulu's equipment.)
Hey, are you even paying attention? ... A commission's been completed.
...... (The Commander silently confirmed the results of the commission.)
It's been some time since Honolulu started working as my secretary, and to a point, we've begun to understand each other's ways of doing things. However...
While she does her work just as you'd expect, for some reason, she always seems to be in a bad mood. I feel like she's hard to initiate a conversation with.
D-don't touch me from behind without asking! You need to learn how to be more delicate... So, what do you want?
... No, I'm not angry, but maybe there's something that's bothering me.
... I'm not trying to say that I hate you... I've just always had a temper like this.
If you don't like it then maybe you should get someone else to do the job...
<size=33>(Whispering) ... I bet you just chose me because of my bust...</size>
I can only conclude that Honolulu isn't upset at me in particular.
If I had to guess, she's just not very good at communicating her feelings...
... That actually made me a little curious about her.
